title: PM Modi highlights India’s 90% growth in over a decade, promises dynamic policies
selftext: Reading this article makes me question my own mental capacity and exactly how delusional and disconnected he has become from the ground reality. With each year, the economic struggles which the country has to endure stating with unemployment, high tariff rate, etc., these kinds of statements feel like adding salt to the already growing wound of the middle-class. I challenge anyone to read this article without atleast once questioning exactly what he had in mind while speaking.
